snippet: Studies of selective colleges — which have more resources and higher graduation rates than others — are often based on 200 to 250 institutions based on categories chosen by Barron’s.
abstract: Studies of selective colleges — which have more resources and higher graduation rates than others — are often based on 200 to 250 institutions based on categories chosen by Barron’s.

headline.main: What Makes a College 'Selective' -- and Why It Matters
